summary: This is an email from a U.S. Attorney's Office paralegal to defense counsel regarding discovery production in the case U.S. v Thomas, providing attachments including a letter and discovery materials marked attorney's eyes only.

persons.name: Montell Figgins
persons.context: Recipient of the email regarding discovery production in the case U.S. v Thomas.

events.title: Discovery Production 6
events.description: The U.S. Attorney's Office produces discovery materials in the case U.S. v Thomas, including a letter and additional pages marked attorney's eyes only.

keyFacts: The document is an email regarding discovery production in the case U.S. v Thomas, No. 19 Cr 830.
Discovery materials include a letter and additional pages marked 'attorney's eyes only'.
The production is being uploaded to USAfx and distributed to defense counsel.
The correspondence originates from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
